## removeEmptyProperties() function

Returns a copy of a JSON with undefined and null properties removed

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function removeEmptyProperties(event: Record<string, unknown>, exemptFields?: Record<string, boolean>): Record<string, unknown>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  event | Record&lt;string, unknown&gt; | JSON object to clean |
|  exemptFields | Record&lt;string, boolean&gt; | Set of fields which should not be removed even if empty |

<b>Returns:</b>

Record&lt;string, unknown&gt;

A cleaned copy of eventJson
